Package sample

Class FilterRequestController<bg>

java.lang.Object
sample.LogINpanelController
sample.DonorPanelController
sample.PendingRequestController
sample.FilterRequestController<bg>
Type Parameters:
bg - 
public class FilterRequestController<bg>
extends PendingRequestController
This is the controller class for managing the Filter requests. Lot of filters are predefined here in the class in lists to avoid invalid queries into the database.

    • initialize

      public void initialize()
      This is the initializing function of the fxml components. When a the window is launched this method initializes these components. Establishes the connection with the database and upon fetching the data columns works with the property values.
      Overrides:
      initialize in class PendingRequestController

    • pressSearchFilter

      public void pressSearchFilter​(javafx.event.ActionEvent even) throws java.io.IOException
      This is for Imposing the search filters. The method formulates a proper query with the constraints and searches the database for the results. If else blocks are used for handling the null fields.
      Parameters:
      even - , Object of ActionEvent Class
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException
